dial.name: Brush.Brush Size
dial.info: Press to select the masking brush tool.

dial.name: Brush.Brush Hardness
dial.info: Press to select the masking brush tool.

dial.name: Brush.Brush Opacity
dial.info: Press to select the masking brush tool.

dial.name: Brush.Brush Flow
dial.info: Press to select the masking brush tool.

dial.name: Layer.Select Layer
dial.info: Press to select the background layer.

dial.name: Layer.Layer Opacity
dial.info: Press to toggle the active layer on/off.

orbiter.name: Adjust Any Value
orbiter.info:
Hover over any slider or numeric value with your cursor, then turn the Orbiter ring to adjust incrementally.

Requires the following preference in Ver. 20:
Preferences > General > Tool Tabs > Select "Scroll wheel changes slider value"

orbiter.name: speedEdit
orbiter.label: Speed Edit
orbiter.info:
Hold any one of the Speed Edit keys (ex. Q for Exposure), then turn the ring in order to make adjustments.

Capture One 21 or later required.

Turn = Select photo
Tilt is unassigned
